title: BRIEF-The Dixie Group Announces Estimated Impact Of Tax Cut And Jobs Act Of 2017
text:
February 7, 2018 / 9:44 AM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-The Dixie Group Announces Estimated Impact Of Tax Cut And Jobs Act Of 2017 Reuters Staff 
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Dixie Group Inc: 
* THE DIXIE GROUP ANNOUNCES ESTIMATED IMPACT OF TAX CUT AND JOBS ACT OF 2017 
* ‍EXPECTS THAT FUTURE US AFTER-TAX EARNINGS WILL BE POSITIVELY IMPACTED BY RECENTLY-ENACTED CHANGES TO US CORPORATE TAXES​ 
* DIXIE GROUP- ‍CURRENT ESTIMATED IMPACT OF TAX CUT AND JOBS ACT OF 2017 IS A NON-CASH CHARGE TO INCOME STATEMENT OF ABOUT $8.2 MILLION TO AFFECT CO‘S 2017 RESULTS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
